name.baseName: Gold-containing waste liquid ; Recycled gold, gold-containing recycled raw materials ; Chemical extraction ; All sizes; NESPS2
含金废液 ; 再生金、含金再生原料 ; 化学提取 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ChromiumisPhysicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ChromiumisPhysicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程是对含金废液进行再生和提取金，适用于所有规模的应用。该过程回收金，然后可以作为再生原材料在各种行业中重复使用，如电子行业，其中金是关键组成部分。所采用的末端污染管理技术包括用于氨氮和化学需氧量污染物的厌氧和好氧生物处理，以及用于汞、镉、砷、铅和铬污染物的物理化学处理。这些方法表明，该过程用于重视环境管理和污染控制的设施。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码42,四级代码4210文件，在完整版文件中第2460页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management20，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为20，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution MercuryisPhysicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management10，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标汞的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法，其效率为10，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为汞，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (days/year) / production time (days/year)
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备运行时间（小时/年）/正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
